desc: Same day delivery of indoor house plant gifts. We offer indoor plants and pots hand delivered straight to your door. Gift wrapped indoor plants delivered to Geelong, The Bellarine and Torquay. Specialising in botanical indoor house plants, plant styling and plant event hire. The sustainable options to flower delivery.

layout.text: THE GIFT THAT KEEPS ON GIVING

Curated House Plant Gifting service and homewares collection
Homewares ship Australia wide
Next day delivery to  Geelong | The Bellarine | Torquay on plants
